question: Which of the following statements accurately describes the behavior of theelseblock in a Pythontry-exceptstatement?

options.A: It is executed when an exception occurs in thetryblock.
options.B: It is executed when thetryblock completes without any exceptions.
options.C: It is executed only if an exception occurs in theexceptblock.
options.D: It is executed when the program terminates.

answer_description: Theelseblock in atry-exceptstatement is executed when the try block completes without any exceptions.

question: What is the purpose of thesortedfunction in Python when used with loops?

options.A: Reverses the order of elements in a list.
options.B: Sorts the elements in ascending order.
options.C: Returns the index and value of each element in a sequence.
options.D: Checks for equality of elements in multiple sequences.

answer_description: Thesortedfunction in Python is used to sort the elements in ascending order.
